Name: maximize_total_feature_priority
Description: Sum the priority values of all completed features to maximize business value.

Name: minimize_project_budget_overrun
Description: Keep the total project cost below or at the planned budget.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Increase the average amount of story points a team completes per sprint.

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Complete all planned user stories with the minimum possible effort.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Ensure the highest possible number of sprint goals are successfully achieved.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_value
Description: Prioritize features that are relevant to stakeholders with high influence.

Name: minimize_blocker_resolution_time
Description: Reduce the time between blocker detection and resolution.

Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the number of story points completed within a single sprint.

Name: minimize_project_schedule_slippage
Description: Ensure the project finishes as close as possible to the planned end date.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Optimize task assignment to make the best use of available worker time.

Name: minimize_epic_spillover
Description: Minimize the number of epics that are not completed within the planned release.

Name: maximize_user_story_completion
Description: Maximize the number of user stories that reach 'done' status.
